candidates.name: Josh McLaurin
candidates.background: Georgia State Representative from District 51 (Sandy Springs area). Attorney and progressive champion in the state legislature. Known for work on criminal justice reform, education funding, and healthcare access. Rising star in Georgia Democratic politics.
experience: Attorney specializing in civil rights and constitutional law
keyIssues: Criminal justice reform and sentencing reform
candidates.notes: Strong progressive record, articulate communicator, experienced legislator

republicanCandidates.name: John F. Kennedy
republicanCandidates.background: Current State Senator from District 20 (includes Houston County). Running for Lieutenant Governor, which creates open seat in SD-20. Conservative Republican with focus on business and economic issues.
republicanCandidates.notes: His run for Lt. Gov creates open seat opportunity in SD-20
